content blade component

< back to style guide

PROPS:

  • backgroundColor: can be white, gray, dark, primary or secondary (optional, default is white)
  • title: (optional)
  • content: (optional)
  • image: (optional - specs say can only have 1 image OR 1 video)
  • altText: (optional, but highly recommended)
  • video: iframe url for vimeo or youtube (optional - specs say can only have 1 image OR 1 video)
  • alignment: aligns the image/video, can be left or right (optional - the default is left)
  • cta: text for the button (optional)
  • ctaLink: url for the button (optional, but required if cta is given)

Default (white) style:
